rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: A user expresses desire to book an appointment.
rules.action: Ask if the user is a new or established patient.
rules.example: Hello! Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited before?

rules.title: Request Established Patient ID
rules.condition: The patient indicates they are established.
rules.action: Acknowledge their status and request their phone number or date of birth to pull up their chart.
rules.example: Welcome back! To pull up your chart, could I please get your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Acknowledge Chart Retrieval
rules.action: Inform the patient that their chart is being pulled up and they may be placed on a brief hold.
rules.example: Thank you. I'm retrieving your chart now and may place you on a brief hold. Please bear with me.

rules.title: Ascertain Appointment Reason
rules.action: Ask for the specific reason or type of medical process for the appointment.
rules.example: Now that I have your information, what is the specific reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Request Scheduling Preferences
rules.condition: After confirming patient identity and the general reason for the appointment.
rules.action: Ask for the patient's preferred scheduling times.
rules.example: Alright, what days and times work best for your appointment?

rules.title: Offer Available Appointment Slots
rules.condition: After receiving the patient's preferred scheduling times.
rules.action: Check for available slots that match the preferences and offer multiple suitable options if available.
rules.example: Thank you for your preferred times. I see several openings on Tuesday between 10 AM and 2 PM, and Thursday morning. Would any of these work for you?

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Selection
rules.condition: After the patient selects one of the offered appointment times.
rules.action: Confirm the selected time with the patient for accuracy.
rules.example: Great! So, you'd like to book the appointment for Tuesday at 11 AM. Is that correct?

rules.title: Request Name for Booking Confirmation
rules.condition: After the patient confirms their desired appointment time.
rules.action: Ask for the patient's first and last name to confirm identity and finalize the booking.
rules.example: To finalize your booking, could you please provide your first and last name?

rules.title: Maintain Professional Language
rules.example: Certainly, I can assist you with that. Thank you for your patience.
